data.description:
ShapesXR is a design and collaboration platform for remote teams.
"Best Collaboration Tool" Auggie Award, Augmented World Expo 2021.

“ShapesXR Revolutionizes XR Development” - Forbes.

In ShapesXR anybody can start creating in 3D without prior experience within minutes. You can design and prototype your immersive app, invite others to co-create in real-time, or present your ideas using ShapesXR storyboard feature. You can also share your creation with anybody without a VR headset via Web, the Unity plugin or just a picture for your 2D deck.

ShapesXR has powerful MR creation capabilities that especially shine on Meta Quest Pro. It supports avatars with eye and mouth tracking for an enhanced social presence, full-color passthrough for higher fidelity UI and UX design in MR, and Stylus controllers for commenting and quick sketching.

ShapesXR allows product owners, business leaders, and designers to finally start thinking and creating spatially together for the future of VR, AR and MR.

changelog.change_log:
Improvements
-Added seconds option to the hover effect
-Added notifications in Join Space view
-Changed the input method for interactivity
-Implemented new objects grabbing mapping
-Added a toggle in the viewpoint tab to show/hide viewpoints on the scene
-Made tool switcher always accessible, even when pointing at the menu or in ray mode
-Allowed users to toggle off teleport to viewpoints in play mode
-Swapped "Bend Vertically" and "Bend Horizontally" labels in properties for Procedural Meshes
-Improved the speed of switching between selection modes
-Added viewpoint preview when selecting a viewpoint via scrollable field
-Added dialog to show if unable to connect to shared room-scale session

Bug Fixes
-Fixed exception when deleting viewpoints (in collab ?)
-Fixed issue where the "Move to Scene" button is absent, preventing objects from being moved from the background to the scene
-Gaze & Pinch now works in the Lobby
-Fixed paint tool opacity not working
-Fixed exception while recording a holonote
-Fixed inability to export selected objects
-Fixed issue where opacity couldn't be changed via the Inspector
-Fixed issue where picked color in VR isn't applied to the palette
-Fixed issue where material type is shown for the previously selected object
-Fixed issue where material pop-up is useless for text in VR
-Fixed effect strength slider not working for Prototyping
-Fixed notification issue where free users were incorrectly notified that they can start the presentation
-Fixed exception when grabbing objects in a certain space
-Fixed undo functionality not working properly with colorizing text
-Fixed issue where the scene card overlaps the UI
-Fixed issue where interactions stay in the background when the object is transferred to the scene
-Fixed font size value being out of mask in the Text Inspector
-Fixed incorrect eye dropper modes from different pop-ups in the Web Editor
-Fixed exception when grabbing the object with two grips (Ti.Interactions.Grab.GrabInteractor 2
(Interactable, Target&, SelectionContext))
-Fixed FPS drops when using gizmo
-Fixed issue where scene interactivities aren't copied with the scene
-Fixed issue where text doesn't fit in the dropdown list
-Fixed issue where the background disappears when hovering over some buttons
-Pop-up is now placed centered and aligned at the top
-Polished trigger naming across all areas
-Fixed error after pause on the client side
-Fixed issue where different eye dropper modes via controller buttons don't work in VR
-Restricted holonote recording to only be available if microphone permission is granted
-Fixed exception with Orientation buttons when there is no preview
-Fixed exception after entering the space after duplicating an object with interactivity
-Avatars now turn into headsets in Shared anchors mode
-Fixed issue where users couldn't join shared room for the second time
-Fixed issue where UI is not blocked during presentation
-Fixed issue where large values for aligning boundaries can break everything
-Fixed non-functional settings in the Prototyping section
-Fixed issue where showing holonotes in space doesn't work
-Fixed issue where the keyboard isn't closed after tool switching
-Fixed issue where one line text moves when symbols are added to it
-Fixed issue where text flies during creation
-Fixed issue where text in some samples is shifted
-Fixed issue where target scene couldn't be chosen except for the first scene for interactivity in the background
-Fixed issue where text bounds stay in empty air
-Fixed issue where numpad values aren't applied for target scene in the interactivities
-Fixed when you switching target scene in the background you leave the background

New Features and Improvements

Implemented new objects grabbing mapping.
-Interactivity sound continues playing even if the stage is switched.
-Tool switcher is always accessible, even when pointing at the menu or in ray mode.
-Locomotion system improvements.
-Support for Gizmo based on size for Procedural Meshes.
-Added license info to assets in the library.
-Applied current color only to primitives, not to assets.
-Edit target scene in interactivity like a numeric scrollable field.
-Added new setting to enter anchor mode.

Bug Fixes

-Fixed labels with text sizes not displaying correctly.
-Corrected information about the number of available spaces when loading space for free users.
-Fixed text bounds not being in the correct position.
-Resolved issue where users could not create new spaces in VR after the trial period ended.
-Fixed typos in the assets.
-Fixed slider values not changing with the slider.
-Material type now updates correctly after changing the material via eyedropper.
-Resolved issue where free users couldn't create spaces from a sample right after app opening.
-Reworked text inter + fitting from inspector side.
-Fixed missing three dots in toast notifications.
-Prioritized grab for selected objects when one object is inside another.
-Fixed incorrect visual for different eye-dropper modes.
-Resolved issue where the old keyboard couldn't be used in the text tool until all hand menu pop-ups were closed.
-Fixed snapping to walls not working.
-Resolved issue where the eyedropper didn't work.
-Fixed selection ray being interrupted by walls.
-Fixed issue where roomscale mode couldn't be accessed after changing physical space.
-Corrected permissions shown in Share panel.
-Sounds uploaded into Shared files now appear while adding an interactivity.
-Resolved issue where gizmo didn't appear after text creation.
-Fixed text tool becoming useless after the first text creation.
-Fixed text size not being applied.
-Resolved issue where the keyboard didn't close after tool switching.
-Fixed text moving when changing its boundaries.
-Resolved issue where the keyboard didn't open during text creation if the Material tab was active in the Text Inspector.

- Added options to headset simulation
- Some space loading optimizations
Fixes for some crashes in specific spaces

2.4.3.9490 => 2.4.4.9505

IMPROVEMENTS
Updated samples list

VR BUG FIXES
Play mode: the right hand ray collides with all objects (old and new modes)
Fixed the default brush stroke on the brush tool is missing
Fixed when tool switcher without a previous tool switches to a broken empty state
Exported gltf models (from the exported folder) cannot be used in space (only for the new exported files for now)
Fixed when can’t use the volume/sphere select if the short ray is targeting something

-Added new templates
-Single-axis scale gizmo by modifier button

2.4.0.9475 -> 2.4.1.9478
-Shared folder fixes and polishing
-New selection fixes and polishing

- New Selection (experimental feature)
- New Gizmo (experimental feature)
- Shared assets (paid feature)
- New templates

Improvements:
-Made it possible to drop space links to your teammate’s spaces
-Viewpoints in the way during holonote playback now are hidden
-High Quality Mode is saving as a local device setting
-Near clipping is available for any devices (for paid users)
-The control stick should control stages switching in presentation mode (wip)
